text:
With reference to a report “Former Syndicate member sends suggestions to V-C search committee” published on January 19, P. Asokan, Controller of Examinations of Thiruvalluvar University has clarified that he has not been named in the inquiry committee, which had been constituted following a resolution by the Syndicate to examine the issue of degree certificates and difficulty in starting examinations for newly affiliated courses.

He has clarified that he was not facing charges of insubordination and dereliction of duty. The error is regretted.
title: Controller of Examination clarifies
